original_text: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O Lord, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.
korean_text: 이럴 때에 여호와의 꾸지람과 콧김으로 말미암아 물 밑이 드러나고 세상의 터가 나타났도다

sentences.original_text: Then the channels of waters were seen
and the foundations of the world were discovered
at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils
